Business Taxation

You will develop your knowledge and understanding of the UK taxation policy as applicable to single companies, and groups of companies with the latest United Kingdom Finance Act which received Royal Assent. You will explore the application of technical knowledge and professional judgement to identify and critically appraise alternative tax treatments to business taxation issues

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Explain and compute the corporation tax liabilities of companies and groups of companies. [Enquiry, Application & Analysis]

+  Explain the taxation and compliance obligations of businesses/companies. [Knowledge, Understanding & Communication]

+  Construct business taxation computations (unincorporated and incorporated). [Application, Knowledge & Problem Solving]

+   Reflect on business tax rules associated with specific areas of income. [Enquiry & Reflection]
